original: phan tshun gnyis ka so sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo g-yon pa rab tu brkyang ba dpung ba g-yas pa'i rtsa bar gtad la mthe bong g-yas pas mthe chung gi sor mo mnan zhing sor mo lhag ma legs par brkyang bas /
analyzed: phan tshun gnyis ka so sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo g-yon pa rab tu brkyang ba dpung ba g-yas pa'i rtsa bar gtad la mthe bong g-yas pas mthe chung gi sor mo mnan zhing sor mo lhag ma legs par brkyang bas /
translated: Oṃ, bind, bind, all directions, bind, bind.

original: phyogs bcur bskor bar bya @46b ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bskor bar bya @46b ba'o //
translated: One should circumambulate the mandala in the ten directions.

original: aom rdo rje'i khro bo gtum po chen po phyogs bcu chings shig h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: aom rdo rje'i khro bo gtum po chen po phyogs bcu chings shig h'um h'um phat phat /
translated: Oṃ, vajra, great fierce wrath, bind the ten directions, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: de nas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, shaking the vajra, one should say this:

original: khro rgyal chen po grub ba dang // grub pa'i dam tshig bstan pa dang / grub pa'i lha rnams kun gyis kyang //
analyzed: khro rgyal chen po grub ba dang // grub pa'i dam tshig bstan pa dang / grub pa'i lha rnams kun gyis kyang //
translated: The great king of wrath is accomplished, and the pledge of accomplishment is taught, and all the deities of accomplishment,

original: dngos grub bla med bdag myur mdzod //
analyzed: dngos grub bla med bdag myur mdzod //
translated: quickly grant me the unsurpassed accomplishment.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dam tshig bcings la /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dam tshig bcings la /
translated: Binding the pledge seal of the king of wrath,

original: h'um badzra phat bya bas dam tshig bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: h'um badzra phat bya bas dam tshig bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: one should display the pledge by saying, Hūṃ vajra phaṭ.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la khro bo kun nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings pas rdo rje'i khro bo rang gi lus la legs par gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la khro bo kun nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings pas rdo rje'i khro bo rang gi lus la legs par gzhug par bya ste /
translated: Then, having made offerings to the Bhagavat, one should bind the seal of the all-encompassing wrathful one and well cause the vajra wrathful one to enter one's body,

original: aom legs par zhugs shing /
analyzed: aom legs par zhugs shing /
translated: saying, Oṃ, well enter.

original: khro bo h'um h'um h'um aa:/
analyzed: khro bo h'um h'um h'um aa:/
translated: Wrathful one, hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ aḥ.

original: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas dkrigs pa /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas dkrigs pa /
translated: Surrounded by a garland of flames,🔽 one should say, Hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 'jigs par byed pa'i rdo rje aa:/
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa'i rdo rje aa:/
translated: The terrifying vajra A.

original: rang gi lus kyi nang du bsres la go cha la sogs pa yang bgos te /
analyzed: rang gi lus kyi nang du bsres la go cha la sogs pa yang bgos te /
translated: Having mixed it into one's body, one should also don the armor, and so forth.

original: de dag thams cad chub bar bya ba'i don du thal mo kha sbyar la /
analyzed: de dag thams cad chub bar bya ba'i don du thal mo kha sbyar la /
translated: In order to make all of that complete, one should join the palms together,

original: kun chub par bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun chub par bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya ba ni /
translated: and recite the mantra for making complete:

original: aom grub pa'i rdo rje a'a pur ya a'a bur ya /
analyzed: aom grub pa'i rdo rje a'a pur ya a'a bur ya /
translated: Oṃ, O vajra of accomplishment, be accomplished!

original: bya ba 'dis lhag pa dang chad pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba 'dis lhag pa dang chad pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all that is left out or omitted becomes completely purified.

original: de nas rdo rje khro bo ni nga yin zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khro bo ni nga yin zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la /
translated: Then, having generated the pride, “I am the wrathful vajra,”

original: dngos grub rnams thams cad kun nas dgug par bya ste /🔽phan tshun du khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis mdud par bya zhing /
analyzed: dngos grub rnams thams cad kun nas dgug par bya ste / phan tshun du khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis mdud par bya zhing /
translated: one should summon all the accomplishments.🔽Having made a fist with the two hands, one should tie the two little fingers together,

original: mdzub mo dag rab tu brkyang ba bkug par gyur pas cung zad brkyang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo dag rab tu brkyang ba bkug par gyur pas cung zad brkyang bar bya ba'o //
translated: and having extended the two index fingers, one should slightly extend the two middle fingers.

original: aom rdo rje khros pa'i khro bo dngos grub rnams khug cig h'um dza:bya ba'i sngags 'dis so //
analyzed: aom rdo rje khros pa'i khro bo dngos grub rnams khug cig h'um dza:bya ba'i sngags 'dis so //
translated: With the mantra, Oṃ, O wrathful one of the wrathful vajra, summon the accomplishments! Hūṃ jaḥ!

original: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rnam par bsam par bya ba ni mgo gyen du bltas pa'i yi ge 'di dag rnams te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rnam par bsam par bya ba ni mgo gyen du bltas pa'i yi ge 'di dag rnams te /
translated: Then, one should imagine that they are located on a moon disk in one’s heart, these syllables with their heads facing upward,

original: mthing nag gi khor yug dang 'dra ba'i phreng bar gyur pa /
analyzed: mthing nag gi khor yug dang 'dra ba'i phreng bar gyur pa /
translated: in a garland like a dark blue halo,

original: h'um badzra phat do //
analyzed: h'um badzra phat do //
translated: with hūṃ vajra phaṭ.

original: de las rang nyid kyi ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas khro bo'i tshogs rnams spro ba dang / legs par sdud par byed par rnam par bsam mo //
analyzed: de las rang nyid kyi ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas khro bo'i tshogs rnams spro ba dang / legs par sdud par byed par rnam par bsam mo //
translated: From that, one should imagine that a host of wrathful ones emanates and gathers back into one’s pores.

original: sgom pas skyon ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: sgom pas skyon ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste /
translated: Having meditated, one should begin the recitation,

original: de yid la byed cing yi ge la cig tu sems pas so //
analyzed: de yid la byed cing yi ge la cig tu sems pas so //
translated: with that in mind, and with the mind focused on the syllables.

original: bzlas pas dub na ni khro bo'i sku rnams rang gi snying ka'i nang du bstims la /🔽thal mo sbyar ba byas pas dngos grub rnams thams cad don du gnyer bar bya ste /
analyzed: bzlas pas dub na ni khro bo'i sku rnams rang gi snying ka'i nang du bstims la / thal mo sbyar ba byas pas dngos grub rnams thams cad don du gnyer bar bya ste /
translated: When one is tired of the recitation, one should dissolve the forms of the wrathful ones into one’s heart,🔽and with palms joined, one should request all the spiritual powers,

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub pa'i rdo rjes mtshan kun nas rdzogs par @47a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub pa'i rdo rjes mtshan kun nas rdzogs par @47a * //
translated: with the mantra “By the vajra that fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings, may all my wishes be fulfilled.”

original: mdzad pas dngos grub thams cad bdag la stsol cig h'um dza:de nas padma'i phyag rgya byas la mthe bong gnyis bskyod par bya ba ni /
analyzed: mdzad pas dngos grub thams cad bdag la stsol cig h'um dza:de nas padma'i phyag rgya byas la mthe bong gnyis bskyod par bya ba ni /
translated: Then, having made the lotus gesture, one should move the two thumbs:

original: lha rnams thams cad gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: this is the seal of requesting the departure of all deities.

original: sngags ni / aom sar sar bi sar bi sar gatstsha gatstsha lha rnams thams cad de /
analyzed: sngags ni / aom sar sar bi sar bi sar gatstsha gatstsha lha rnams thams cad de /
translated: The mantra is: Oṃ sarva-deva-viśva-viśva-gaccha gaccha, all deities

original: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag par bka' sgo ba yin no sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag par bka' sgo ba yin no sv'a h'a /
translated: are summoned by the glorious Vajra Holder svāhā.

original: de nas ni rang gi lus la go cha bgos la /
analyzed: de nas ni rang gi lus la go cha bgos la /
translated: Then, having put on the armor on one's body,

original: khro bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i yid kyis ji ltar bde bar rgyu bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i yid kyis ji ltar bde bar rgyu bar bya ba'o //
translated: with a mind endowed with the pride of wrathfulness, one should move about as one pleases.

original: rim pa 'di nyid kyis sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pa 'di nyid kyis sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this very procedure, having recited the mantra one hundred thousand times, one will quickly accomplish [the deity].

original: gal te sngags pa dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang pa dang / sngon du 'gro ba yang bya ste /
analyzed: gal te sngags pa dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang pa dang / sngon du 'gro ba yang bya ste /
translated: If the mantra practitioner has been initiated, has received permission, and has also performed the preliminaries,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni /
translated: and if one wishes to accomplish the Vajra Holder,🔽one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times.

original: zla ba gcig tu thun gsum la stong phrag gcig bzlas bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig tu thun gsum la stong phrag gcig bzlas bar bya ba'o //
translated: One should recite one thousand times in three sessions for one month.

original: de nas zla ba nyal ni phun sum tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas la shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de nas zla ba nyal ni phun sum tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas la shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Then, at night, having made offerings as much as possible, one should bind the mudrā of the wrathful one with complete equipoise.

original: mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya ba'o //
translated: One should recite throughout the night.

original: de nas nam mkha' 'byung ba dang / sa g-yo ba dang / phyag rgya 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' 'byung ba dang / sa g-yo ba dang / phyag rgya 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, space will emerge, the earth will shake, and the mudrā will descend.

original: 'bar ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'bar ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: By merely igniting it, one will become like Vajradhara.

original: rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med pa dang / lha'i lus su 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
analyzed: rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med pa dang / lha'i lus su 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
translated: One will become ageless, immortal, and have a divine body. Thus it was spoken by the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: mdor bsdus shing legs par rdzogs la rnam par gsal ba dang / rim pa legs par 'brel bas 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: mdor bsdus shing legs par rdzogs la rnam par gsal ba dang / rim pa legs par 'brel bas 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The sādhana of Vināyaka, concise, well-completed, clear, and with well-connected stages,

original: yan lag dang bcas pa sems can mtha' dag bsgral bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rje mdzes par bsdebs pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: yan lag dang bcas pa sems can mtha' dag bsgral bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rje mdzes par bsdebs pa rdzogs so /
translated: The three worlds are beautified by the vajra, which is for the sake of liberating all sentient beings.

original: // / pandi ta aa bha ya la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta aa bha ya la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The translation was made by the monk Tsultrim Gyaltsen, based on the teachings of the pandits Abhaya and others.
